title: Understanding the PV Function
text: The PV function is used in finance to determine the present value of a series of future cash flows. It helps in understanding how much a future sum of money is worth today.

title: Components of the PV Function
text: The PV function typically requires inputs such as the interest rate, number of periods, and future value to calculate the present value.
